attach_file.description: Upload and attach a file to an item/task/comment.

props.name: refType
props.description: What type of object to attach the file to

create_comment.description: Post a comment on an item or task.

props.name: type
props.description: What type of object to comment on

props.name: id
props.description: Select the specific object to comment on

props.name: value
props.description: The content of your comment

props.name: externalId
props.description: Optional external identifier for the comment

props.name: fileIds
props.description: Select files from the space to attach to this comment (enter file IDs from the space)

props.name: embedId
props.description: ID of a previously created embedded link

props.name: embedUrl
props.description: URL to embed in the comment

props.name: alertInvite
props.description: Automatically invite mentioned users to the workspace if they lack access

create_item.description: Create a new record in a Podio app with specified field values.

props.name: orgId
props.description: Select an organization to filter apps by workspace. Leave empty to see all apps.

props.name: spaceId
props.description: Select a workspace to filter apps. Leave empty to see all apps in the organization.

props.name: externalId
props.description: The external id of the item. This can be used to hold a reference to the item in an external system.

props.name: appFields
props.description: Configure values for the fields in the selected app

props.name: legacyFields
props.description: Advanced: Use this for complex field configurations. Format: {"field_id": {"value": "content"}}. Only use if the dynamic fields above don\

props.name: fileIds
props.description: Temporary files that have been uploaded and should be attached to this item

props.name: tags
props.description: The tags to put on the item

props.name: reminder
props.description: Optional reminder on this item. Format: {"remind_delta": minutes_before_due_date}

props.name: recurrence
props.description: The recurrence for the task, if any. Format: {"name": "weekly|monthly|yearly", "config": {...}, "step": 1, "until": "date"}

props.name: linkedAccountId
props.description: The linked account to use for the meeting

props.name: ref
props.description: The reference for the new item, if any. Format: {"type": "item", "id": reference_id}

create_status.description: Add a status to an item or workspace stream.

props.name: value
props.description: What would you like to share?

props.name: fileIds
props.description: File IDs to attach to this status update (enter file IDs from the space)

props.name: embedId
props.description: ID of a previously created embedded link

props.name: embedUrl
props.description: URL to embed in the status update

props.name: question
props.description: Create a poll with your status. Format: {"text": "Question?", "options": ["Option 1", "Option 2"]}

props.name: alertInvite
props.description: Automatically invite mentioned users to the workspace if they lack access

create_task.description: Add a new task to an item or workspace with due dates, assignees, and attachments.

props.name: text
props.description: The description or text of the task

props.name: description
props.description: Additional description for the task

props.name: private
props.description: Whether the task should be private (only creator, assignee and assignor can see it)

props.name: dueDate
props.description: Due date in local time (date only)

props.name: dueTime
props.description: Due time in local time (HH:MM:SS format, e.g., "14:30:00")

props.name: dueOn
props.description: Complete due date and time in UTC. Alternative to separate date/time fields.

props.name: responsible
props.description: Who is responsible for this task. Can be a user ID (number) or contact identifier object with type and id.

props.name: fileIds
props.description: List of file IDs to attach to this task

props.name: labels
props.description: List of label names in text form

props.name: labelIds
props.description: List of label IDs (alternative to text labels)

props.name: reminder
props.description: Reminder settings. Format: {"remind_delta": minutes_before_due_date}

props.name: recurrence
props.description: Recurring task settings. Format: {"name": "weekly|monthly|yearly", "config": {...}, "step": 1, "until": "date"}

props.name: externalId
props.description: External system identifier for this task

find_item.description: Retrieve a single item by ID or field value.

props.name: searchType
props.description: How to find the item

props.name: itemId
props.description: The specific item ID to retrieve

props.name: markAsViewed
props.description: Mark any new notifications on this item as viewed

props.name: filters
props.description: Filter criteria as JSON object. Use field external_id as keys.

props.name: sortBy
props.description: Field to sort results by (e.g., "created_on", "last_edit_on")

props.name: sortDesc
props.description: Sort results in descending order

find_task.description: Retrieve a task by ID for further updates.

update_item.description: Update an existing record in a Podio app with specified field values. Only provided fields will be updated.

props.name: appFields
props.description: Configure values for the fields you want to update in the selected app

props.name: revision
props.description: The revision of the item that is being updated. Optional for conflict detection.

props.name: externalId
props.description: The new external_id of the item

props.name: legacyFields
props.description: Manual field configuration using field_id or external_id as keys. Use this for advanced scenarios or when dynamic fields are not sufficient.

props.name: fileIds
props.description: The list of attachments

props.name: tags
props.description: The list of tags

props.name: reminder
props.description: Optional reminder on this item. Format: {"remind_delta": minutes_before_due_date}

props.name: recurrence
props.description: The recurrence for the task, if any. Format: {"name": "weekly|monthly|yearly", "config": {...}, "step": 1, "until": "date"}

props.name: linkedAccountId
props.description: The linked account to use for meetings

props.name: ref
props.description: The reference of the item. Format: {"type": "reference_type", "id": reference_id}

props.name: text
props.description: The updated text (title) for the task

props.name: description
props.description: The updated description for the task

props.name: dueDate
props.description: The new due date for the task (in users timezone)

props.name: dueTime
props.description: The new due time for the task in local timezone (HH:MM:SS format, e.g., "14:30:00")

props.name: private
props.description: Whether the task should be private (only creator, assignee and assignor can see it)

props.name: completed
props.description: Mark the task as completed or not completed

props.name: responsible
props.description: The user ID of the person responsible for this task

props.name: labels
props.description: The labels for the task. Either a list of label ids or label texts

props.name: fileIds
props.description: The list of files that should be attached to the task

props.name: reminder
props.description: Optional reminder on this task. Format: {"remind_delta": minutes_before_due_date}. If empty, existing reminder is deleted.

item_updated.description: Fires when an existing item is updated (excluding comments)

new_activity.description: Fires when a new status is created in a workspace stream

new_item.description: Fires when a new item (record/entry) is created in an app

new_app.description: Fires when a new app is created in a workspace

new_task.description: Fires when a new task is added to any workspace

member_added.description: Fires when a new member is added to a workspace
